text: hananimkkeseo bulsinjadeul-eul biyuhasa noaui anaewa los-ui anaeleul biyuhasyeossnani geudeul dul-eun hananim ui uiloun jongdeul mit-e iss-eoss-euna geu dul-eun geudeul-ui nampyeondeul-eul baebanhayeoss-eu mae geudeul-ui haeng-wilo malmiam-a hana nim-eulobuteo amu geosdo eodji moshan chae neohuineun daleun salamdeul-i deul-eoga neun jiog-eulo hamkke deul-eogalaneun mal bakk-en eod-eun geos-i eobs-eossnola
